sentences.en: Cellophane is made of long, fibrous molecules.
sentences.cn: 玻璃纸系由长形纤维分子组成.

sentences.en: Cooking denatures protein, melts out fat and breaks down the fibrous tissue.
sentences.cn: 烹煮使蛋白质变性, 熔化脂肪,而且分解纤维组织.

sentences.en: Fibre optics: The studies of light that transmits through transparent fibrous materials.
sentences.cn: 纤维光学: 研究光线沿透明纤维材料传送的科学.

sentences.en: Grohal belong to the coated paper series, the munltivariable uniform, fibrous tissue.
sentences.cn: 轻涂纸属于涂布纸序列, 其纤维组织均匀, 厚薄一致.

sentences.en: Grow on lateral root have a lot of fibrous root.
sentences.cn: 侧根上长有许多的须根.

sentences.en: Low power microscopy illustrates the multilocular cysts separated by fibrous tissue.
sentences.cn: 低倍镜显示纤维组织分隔的多房囊腔.

sentences.en: Microscopically, the fibrous pleural plaque is composed of dense layers of collagen.
sentences.cn: 镜下纤维性胸膜斑由数层致密的胶原纤维组成.

sentences.en: Tendons are the thellock fibrous cords that attach muscle to bone.
sentences.cn: 肌腱是附着肌肉一禅瑜伽博客以及骨上的厚纤维带.

sentences.en: Tendons are the thick fibrous cords that attach muscle to bone.
sentences.cn: 肌腱是附着肌肉和骨上的厚纤维带.

sentences.en: The ABC fibrous buildup has started inside the carbon structure.
sentences.cn: ABC纤维性的组成已经开始与碳结构内部.

sentences.en: The arrangement, direction, or pattern of the fibrous tissue in wood.
sentences.cn: 纹理:木头的纤维组织的排列 、 方向或图案.

sentences.en: The coconut has a fibrous outer covering.
sentences.cn: 椰子有一个纤维质的外壳。

sentences.en: The saponification generated with the resin of fibrous materials.
sentences.cn: 与纤维原料中树脂产生皂化作用.

sentences.en: The shear stress in intervertebral disc mainly distributed in fibrous rings.
sentences.cn: 椎间盘的剪切应力主要分布在纤维环.

sentences.en: Wetting of fibrous materials can critically affect many manufacturing processes.
sentences.cn: 纤维材料的润湿,会严重影响它的许多加工工艺.

sentences.en: Yet arteries often renarrowed if walls recoiled or if fibrous tissue grew.
sentences.cn: 然而,如果血管壁弹回,或是纤维组织继续生长,动脉在手术之后常常还是会变得狭窄.
